column1: Mapping of MCP23017 pins to solenoid valves and matrix row/column
We want to address the valves in ascending order by the way software sees them. wiringPi will address GPA0 as the first pin and GPB7 as the last one.
IC1 controls rows. Address 32 = 0x20. Pins 15, 16, 17 grounded.
IC2 controls columns. Address 33 = 0x21. Pin 15 connected to 3V3. Pins 16, 17 grounded.
